all_questions.question: What is sentence evaluation through similarity?
all_questions.context: Then you can also evaluate sentences through similarity.

all_questions.question: How do humans provide scores for similar sentences?
all_questions.context: There you ask human informants how similar in some way are these two sentences and humans will give you a score

all_questions.question: What is regression analysis used for in sentence evaluation?
all_questions.context: You can train regression on the training data if there is some

all_questions.question: How do you measure similarity between embeddings when no regression analysis is performed?
all_questions.context: And then you will evaluate the sentence embeddings either by training regression on the training data if there is some and if there is no you can simply measure the similarity between the embeddings

all_questions.question: What method do humans use to predict similarity based on similarities of embeddings?
all_questions.context: and predict the similarity by the similarity of the embeddings
